titles: His Maiesties demands to the gentry of York-shire, concerning the towne of Hull, answered by two severall parties.
publisher: Printed for Richard Lowndes, and are to be sold at his Shop next without Ludgate,
notes: Answers "whether they would defend his person from violence and advise him how to vindicate himself from the affront he had received at Hull." -- Thomason Catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
